name: Volatile Particle
description:
Features:

  • Manipulate your electric charge to navigate your environment and reach the goal
  • Master the physics of electric particles, electric fields and magnetic fields
  • Demonstrate control by avoiding lasers and collecting gems
  • Hunt every last gem or find the fastest lines to break records
  • Play dozens of levels, ranging from casual and fun to insanely difficult
  • Unleash your creativity and make your own levels
  • Share your creations with friends, and import community levels
